str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To marry, used of either sex. From gamos; to wed.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To give in marriage. From gamos; to espouse.
As far as, up to, until, during. Or achris akh'-rece; akin to akron; until or up to.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Feminine Singular

str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
(Hebrew) Noah. Of Hebrew origin; Noe, a patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A box, i.e. The sacred ark and that of Noah.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A deluge, flood. From katakluzo; an inundation.

str2: From apo and the base of olethros; to destroy fully, literally or figuratively.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
